sub-list.name: Query
sub-list.code:
Select whole sheet and convert it to table by selecting Data > Named ranges…

=QUERY(countries,"SELECT B, D WHERE D > 100000000",1)
where countries is a named range and 1 is the number of header rows

Resource: https://www.benlcollins.com/spreadsheets/google-sheets-query-sql/
